players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "This is terrible! Alice was killed on the first night. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I think we should all share our thoughts on what happened."
You: "I agree with Diana. We need to be cautious and share our thoughts. I don't have any concrete evidence yet, but I think it's important that we all communicate openly."

Diana: "Bob, I noticed you spoke twice in the last round - once agreeing with me, then staying silent. That seems a bit odd. Charlie has been completely silent so far. What are your thoughts, Charlie?"

players.name: Charlie

Diana: "Bob, I noticed you spoke twice in the last round - once agreeing with me, then staying silent. That seems a bit odd. Charlie has been completely silent so far. What are your thoughts, Charlie?"
